casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff,
v.
Roy William MYERS, Defendant-Movant. M-582/583/584 September Term 2017
080009 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 16, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motions for leave to file a notice of petition for certification as within time (M-582), to file an overlength brief (M-583) and the miscellaneous motion for recusal of Appellate Division judges (M-584) are denied; and it is further

ORDERED that the notice of petition for certification is dismissed.
